name: RFP to User Stories Skills
description: A comprehensive suite of Skills for converting RFP (Request for Proposal) documents into high-quality, executable User Stories. Includes analysis, writing, and refinement capabilities with multi-language support.

plugins.name: rfp-analyzer
plugins.description: Performs structured analysis of RFP documents, identifying stakeholders, functional modules, system constraints, and generating key clarification questions. Focuses on 'analysis and decomposition' to prepare for User Story writing.

plugins.name: story-writer
plugins.description: Converts RFP analysis results or functional requirements into high-quality, executable User Stories. Follows INVEST principles, produces complete Stories with acceptance criteria, and organizes output by functional modules. Supports both standard and refine modes.

plugins.name: story-refiner
plugins.description: Evaluates User Story quality and automatically corrects items not meeting standards. Reviews from developer, QA, and stakeholder perspectives using a 1-5 scoring system. Supports iterative refinement (max 3 rounds) to ensure split Stories are also evaluated.
